General.Name: Yue Da International Holdings Limited
General.Description: Yue Da International Holdings Limited, an investment holding company, engages in the factoring business in the People's Republic of China. It offers accounts receivable management and collection, and consultancy services. The company was formerly known as Yue Da Mining Holdings Limited and changed its name to Yue Da International Holdings Limited in December 2018. Yue Da International Holdings Limited was incorporated in 2001 and is headquartered in Sheung Wan, Hong Kong. Yue Da International Holdings Limited is a subsidiary of Yue Da Capital (HK) Limited.
General.Address: China Merchants Tower, Sheung Wan, Hong Kong
